name: sspsstrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wpss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ⊊ c1, c0 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊊ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wpss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wpss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)), wpss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wpss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wpss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)), wpss(c0, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)), wpss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wpss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wpss(c2, c1))

comment: Transitivity involving subclass and proper subclass inclusion. Deduction form of ~ sspsstr . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
